title: Power of Attorney for Electricity
description: Follow the instructions below and scan the power of attorney.
instruction: How to take a good picture:
requirement1: Take the picture straight from above
requirement4: Wait for green marking of document
alternativeMethod: Upload not working? Send via email instead:
successMessage: âœ… Power of attorney has been sent! You don't need to do anything else.
errorUploadFailed: An error occurred. Please try again.
CLAUDE_OVERLOADED: Service is currently overloaded. Please try again later.
CLAUDE_TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again.
RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
CLAUDE_API_ERROR: A technical error occurred. Please try again later.
FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
INVALID_IMAGE_FORMAT: Invalid image format. Only JPG and PNG are supported.
INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Invalid file type. Only images are allowed.
MISSING_PERSONAL_NUMBERS: Personal numbers are missing from the document.
TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again.
NO_RESULT: Document processing completed but no result was returned.
NO_SIGNERS_FOUND: No signatures found in the document. Please upload a signed power of attorney.
NO_ONE_HAS_SIGNED: The document is not signed. At least one person must sign the power of attorney.
INCOMPLETE_SIGNATURES: Some signatures are incomplete (missing date or city)
NO_VALID_SIGNATURES: No valid signatures found. Please ensure all signatures include date and city.
DOCUMENT_ANALYSIS_FAILED: Failed to analyze the document. Please ensure the image is clear and readable.
NO_DATA_EXTRACTED: Could not extract information from the document. Please ensure it's a power of attorney.
FAILED_TO_EXTRACT_INFO: Failed to extract information from the document. Please try with a clearer image.
FAILED_TO_PROCESS: Failed to process the document. Please try again.
